co.lqnt.lockbox.key

Interface PrivateKeyInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeyInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrivateKey

    public interface PrivateKeyInterface
extends KeyInterface
    The interface implemented by Lockbox private keys.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.bouncycastle.asn1.pkcs.RSAPrivateKey bcPrivateKey()
      Get the Bouncy Castle RSA private key.
      org.bouncycastle.asn1.pkcs.PrivateKeyInfo bcPrivateKeyInfo()
      Get the Bouncy Castle private key information.
      org.bouncycastle.crypto.params.RSAPrivateCrtKeyParameters bcPrivateKeyParameters()
      Get the Bouncy Castle RSA private key parameters.
      BigInteger coefficient()
      Get the coefficient, or 'QInv'.
      PrivateKey jcePrivateKey()
      Get the JCE private key.
      BigInteger modulus()
      Get the modulus.
      BigInteger prime1()
      Get the first prime, or 'P'.
      BigInteger prime2()
      Get the second prime, or 'Q'.
      BigInteger primeExponent1()
      Get the first prime exponent, or 'DP'.
      BigInteger primeExponent2()
      Get the second prime exponent, or 'DQ'.
      BigInteger privateExponent()
      Get the private exponent.
      BigInteger publicExponent()
      Get the public exponent.
      PublicKey publicKey()
      Get the public key counterpart for this private key.
      String toPem()
      Get this key as a PEM formatted string.
